methods.name: public abstract Builder addAttribute(@NonNull String name, @NonNull String value)
methods.comment:
* Adds an HTML attribute.
             *
             * @param name name of the attribute.
             * @param value value of the attribute.
             * @return same builder, for chaining.

methods.name: public abstract HtmlInfo build()
methods.comment:
* Builds the {@link HtmlInfo} object.
             *
             * @return a new {@link HtmlInfo} instance.
